Referenced by cullPoints2().

#define TST (   expr1,
  expr2,
  n1,
  n2,
  n3,
  cc 
)
Value:
s2 = btFabs(expr1) - (expr2); \
  if (s2 > SIMD_EPSILON) return 0; \
  l = btSqrt((n1)*(n1) + (n2)*(n2) + (n3)*(n3)); \
  if (l > SIMD_EPSILON) { \
    s2 /= l; \
    if (s2*fudge_factor > s) { \
      s = s2; \
      normalR = 0; \
      normalC[0] = (n1)/l; normalC[1] = (n2)/l; normalC[2] = (n3)/l; \
      invert_normal = ((expr1) < 0); \
      code = (cc); \
    } \
  }
#define TST (   expr1,
  expr2,
  norm,
  cc 
)
Value:
s2 = btFabs(expr1) - (expr2); \
  if (s2 > 0) return 0; \
  if (s2 > s) { \
    s = s2; \
    normalR = norm; \
    invert_normal = ((expr1) < 0); \
    code = (cc); \
  }
